thread.title: Francis Dogbatse retains position as Volta Regional FA Chairman
thread.title_full: Francis Dogbatse retains position as Volta Regional FA Chairman

title: Francis Dogbatse retains position as Volta Regional FA Chairman
text:
13:42 CET Francis Dogbatse retains position as Volta Regional FA Chairman By Ghana FA 
Mr. Francis Dogbatse has been re-elected as Chairman of the Volta Regional Football Association after winning the elections held on Monday October 12. 
Mr. Dogbatse secured 37 votes while his contender Mawutor Agbavitor had 31 votes out of the total votes cast. 
The incumbent RFA Chairman will therefore represent the region on the GFA National Executive Committee for another four year term.
